description: Document the current v2 conceptual model (nodes vs actions vs control blocks) and identify duplication hotspots
Write an ADR for the simplification direction (Nodes->Actions, key identity, contract unification, bundle validation unification, optional IR)
Define the target simplified workflow definition shape (control blocks + action steps only)
Define the Action+Effect contract (how actions express waits/human tasks) and error semantics
Define compatibility guarantees for running existing published workflows during migration (dual read, staged rollout)
Define the deprecation policy and end-state deletion list (what modules/files are expected to go away)
Baseline performance/behavior snapshot for key v2 flows (publish, start, event resume, human task resume, bundle import/export)
Define a migration strategy for stored workflow drafts and published versions (auto-migrate vs block)
Add a centralized "workflow runtime model version" marker to support gradual migrations
Introduce a typed Effect model in v2 runtime (wait/human/retry/timeout) with stable serialization
Define an Effect persistence contract (which effect fields are stored in workflow_run_waits, which are log-only)
Extend action registry/runtime bridge so actions can emit effects without bespoke node handlers
Add runtime support to apply an effect (persist wait record, transition run status, emit logs)
Implement an action-based "wait for event" capability that emits an event-wait effect
Implement an action-based "create human task" capability that emits a human-wait effect
Implement an action-based "assign" capability (replace transform.assign node handler with an action)
Implement an action-based "set state" capability (replace state.set node handler with an action)
Implement action-based email helpers currently expressed as node handlers (parse/render)
Define and implement effect-level retry scheduling compatibility (retry is effect-driven, not special-cased)
Add runtime logging conventions for effects (created/resolved wait, created human task, retry scheduled)
Add redaction support for action-emitted effects (no secrets in persisted waits/log previews)
Add a run-log event for "effect resolved" with linkage to wait_id and source payload context
Expose effect metadata to UI run studio (wait type, correlation key, event name, timeouts)
Define a unified ActionStep schema (actionId, version, inputMapping, retry, onError, saveAs, idempotencyKey)
Update publish validation to validate ActionStep directly against the action registry schema
Update runtime execution to treat ActionStep as the only executable non-control step
Provide a compatibility adapter to execute existing v2 NodeSteps by translating them to ActionSteps where possible
Deprecate node-type execution handlers in favor of actions (UI metadata only, optional)
Update workflow definition schema to prohibit non-action node steps (control.* + action step only)
Add a workflow definition migrator that rewrites known built-in node steps to ActionSteps
Add a workflow publish gate: auto-migrate draft definitions on publish; block on unknown legacy shapes with actionable errors
Add an admin-only "validate draft" endpoint that runs publishValidation + migration preview without publishing
Update designer palette to show action-backed steps (including waits/human tasks) instead of node types
Update designer serialization to emit ActionSteps and control blocks only
Add UI affordance for action versions (pin version vs policy-based latest)
Add UI support for configuring effect-producing actions (event wait, human task) with schema-driven forms
Add UI migration: convert trigger payload mapping into explicit mapping ActionSteps on edit/publish
Add UI migration: rewrite callWorkflow blocks from workflowId to workflowKey when possible
Prevent designer from reintroducing deprecated node-step shapes (guard rails in serializer + validation)
Update designer step path/source mapping so logs remain navigable after schema simplification
Add designer UX for showing publish-time contract derivation (event schema ref -> workflow payload contract)
Make workflow key required for v2 workflows (system and tenant) with a safe backfill strategy
Add a uniqueness constraint for workflow key and define collision behavior
Add UI/API to view and edit workflow key (with validation and reserved namespaces for system workflows)
Update bundle export to treat workflow key as the stable identifier (no optional key)
Update callWorkflow control block to reference workflowKey instead of workflowId
Add runtime resolution layer for workflowKey -> workflowId (+ version lookup)
Add a migrator that rewrites callWorkflow blocks from workflowId to workflowKey (when resolvable) and reports when not
Update bundle import to preserve and validate cross-workflow references by workflowKey
Define and enforce event-triggered payload contract: workflow payloadSchemaRef equals effective source schema ref
Remove publish-time payload schema inference mode in favor of deterministic contract derivation
Remove trigger-level payloadMapping as a special-case and replace with explicit mapping ActionSteps
Update event submission logic so matching is based on deterministic contract, not schema-ref heuristics
Update event catalog UX to clearly indicate the payload schema ref and whether workflows depend on it
Add a workflow lint rule: event-triggered workflows must have explicit mapping steps if schema differs from downstream action inputs
Remove bundle dependency summaries from the required bundle format (actions/nodeTypes/schemaRefs become optional metadata)
Replace Ajv JSON-schema validation for bundle bodies with runtime publishValidation per workflow
Update bundle import to validate workflows using publishValidation and return structured errors/warnings
Add bundle import "dry run" mode that returns validation/migration summary without writing to DB
Update bundle export to include only minimal metadata required to publish/run in another environment
Define and document bundle versioning strategy post-simplification (header-only + per-workflow payload)
Introduce a publish-time compiler that converts workflow definitions into a linear instruction IR (optional phase)
Define IR schema, source maps (IR pc -> human-readable step path), and compiler versioning
Store compiled IR on publish (workflow_definition_versions) and optionally backfill for existing versions
Update runtime to execute compiled IR when present, falling back to interpreter otherwise
Update logs/step records so they remain stable and meaningful when running compiled IR
Add a bulk migration tool/command for: keys, callWorkflow rewrite, trigger mapping rewrite, node->action rewrite
Add telemetry for migration outcomes and publish failures by code
Add a rollout switch (flag/config) for enabling the simplified model per environment/tenant
Deprecate/remove node-type registry usage from runtime execution paths after stabilization
Deprecate/remove payload schema mode/provenance fields once contract unification is complete
Deprecate/remove Ajv bundle schema plumbing and legacy dependency summary helpers
Update documentation to reflect the simplified v2 model for extension authors, operators, and internal contributors
Define a canonical "action catalog" metadata model for the designer (label/category/description/icon)
Add policy for action version selection (explicit pin vs default version resolution strategy)
Implement deterministic action version resolution strategy for publish-time and runtime (no hidden drift)
Add publish-time freeze behavior: record resolved action versions in published workflow definition
Add effect validation in publishValidation (wait types, required fields, timeout bounds)
Add effect cancellation semantics for canceled/failed runs (cleanup waits/tasks)
Add run resumption semantics for timeouts (event wait timeout -> resumeError) as effect-driven behavior
Add a single runtime API surface for action implementations (ctx.log, ctx.emitEffect, ctx.resolveMapping)
Add a first-class "mapping" action that converts input schemas to action inputs via inputMappingResolver
Add a first-class "schema.assert" action to validate current payload/vars against a schemaRef
Add publish-time validation error codes for action version pinning problems (missing version, deprecated version)
Add runtime dead-letter entry for effect application failures (persisted error + recoverability hint)
Add admin endpoint/UI to retry a failed effect application (where safe)
Add workflow key format linting and reserved prefixes (e.g. system.*) at create/update time
Add workflow key rename constraints (rename only drafts, or forced migration plan for published)
Add a workflow key backfill job that generates stable keys for existing workflows
Update callWorkflow to support version selector modes (explicit version vs latest-published) with deterministic resolution
Add a workflow reference index that can find inbound callWorkflow references by workflowKey
Block deletion/rename of workflows referenced by other published workflows unless forced
Add explicit schema-ref conflict handling for submitted events (UI + logs + telemetry)
Add workflow publish validation that requires the event catalog entry to exist (or explicit override) for event triggers
Add an admin-only "reconcile schema refs" tool to update workflows when event catalog schema refs change
Update bundle import conflict resolution (key collisions, force overwrite behavior, dry-run diff preview)
Add bundle import support for partial import (select subset of workflows) with dependency-aware warnings
Add bundle export support for exporting referenced workflows (transitive closure via callWorkflow keys)
Add bundle signature/manifest fields (hashes, exportedBy, environment) for auditing and integrity checks
Add deterministic stable JSON normalization for bundle payloads to improve diffability
Introduce IR compiler feature flag and staged enablement (publish stores IR; runtime optionally executes)
Add IR compatibility layer: source maps allow UI/logs to display original step structure
Add IR conformance checks to ensure compiled execution matches interpreter outcomes
Add a migration status dashboard (counts of drafts needing migration; publish blockers by error code)
Add a tenant-level migration runner that can batch-migrate drafts and report progress safely
Add safety rails: migration runner rate limits, dry-run, and rollback strategy
Update existing v2 integration points (event submission, task inbox, run studio) to the simplified schema
Add a compatibility shim so old UI clients can still read workflow definitions after schema upgrade (limited window)
Add additional publish-time validations to reduce runtime surprises (schema refs exist, action inputs satisfiable)
Add a structured error translator that maps runtime errors to user-friendly publish-time guidance
Add comprehensive docs: "Writing an action" guide (inputs, effects, secrets, redactions, idempotency)
Add comprehensive docs: "Workflow contract" guide (event schema refs, mapping steps, compatibility)
Add comprehensive docs: "Bundle" guide (dry-run, import conflicts, auditing)
Add a code health gate to prevent reintroduction of node-type runtime execution paths
Add a code health gate to prevent reintroduction of payloadSchemaMode-based publish behavior
Add a code health gate to prevent reintroduction of Ajv bundle schema validation plumbing
Define a final deletion checklist and perform cleanup once metrics show the simplified model is stable
Remove deprecated runtime branches and migrate tests to the simplified model as the default
Update developer ergonomics: fixtures/templates for common workflows under the simplified schema
Add a "canary" workflow suite used in CI to validate end-to-end behavior across upgrades
